channel.title: NCDOT State Farm Safety Patrol In Action

item.title: Rockfish Rd
item.description:
• City: Raeford
  • County: Hoke
  • Condition: Road Closed with Detour
  • Location: East of Raeford / Both Directions
  • Reason: Due to a bridge replacement project, Rockfish Rd (SR 1406) will be closed to through traffic between Posey Farm Rd (SR 1412) and McPhail Rd (SR 1414). The road is anticipated to be closed to through traffic beginning November 13, 2017, and is anticipated to re-open April 11, 2018. Construction is anticipated to take 150 days in order to complete the work. There will be a signed detour. 
  • Start Date: 11/13/2017 7:00 am
  • End Date: 04/11/2018 5:00 pm
